seo.title: About Me - Max Evchenko
seo.description: Max Evchenko - Frontend developer with many years of experience building modern web applications. Skilled in Vue.js, Nuxt.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS and other technologies for developing high-quality user interfaces.

start_block.title: Getting started
start_block.text: My career began in television in the advertising department, where I worked as a designer of advertising products. At one point our agency needed a website, which started my journey into programming and web development. We built a site on WordPress and later added a website creation service for clients. That was just the beginning. I began studying web development and programming languages such as PHP, CSS and JavaScript. The more I learned, the more I realized that building sites on ready-made engines or with plain languages is not practical or flexible. It was necessary to learn frameworks; the first of them I studied was Laravel.

vue_block.title: Vue.js and Front-End
vue_block.text: When Vue.js was added to Laravel, I was excited by its capabilities and decided to switch to Front-End development. While learning Vue.js I also discovered Node.js and deepened my understanding of JavaScript and its new features. I became familiar with the web technologies listed in the Skills section by solving real tasks and gaining experience. They are described chronologically in the

nuxt_block.title: Nuxt.js
nuxt_block.text: Over time I learned the Nuxt.js framework and realized it is the future of web development. I began using it in my projects. Nuxt.js allowed me to create more complex and scalable applications with less time and effort. I also started using TypeScript to improve code quality and reduce errors.

future_block.title: What's next?
future_block.text: I continue to study new technologies and tools in web development. Just like the Internet, which never stands still, I strive to keep up and improve. I apply all my skills and knowledge in my projects, which you can view in the
